white.description: UI background color. All color contrasts evaluated and generated against this color.

blueberry50.description: Do not use for UI elements or text. WCAG 3 (APCA) contrast is less than 7.57:1 against background #ffffff

blueberry200.description: Do not use for UI elements or text. WCAG 3 (APCA) contrast is 16.41:1 against background #ffffff

blueberry400.description: Do not use for UI elements or text. WCAG 3 (APCA) contrast is 48.45:1 against background #ffffff

blueberry500.description: Color can be used for UI elements or large text. WCAG 3 (APCA) contrast is 61.59:1 against background #ffffff

small.description: Do not use on the platform. For presentation use only.

default.description: The primary colour for interactive elements

hover.description: The colour used for the primary interactive elements when in a hover state

default.description: The secondary colour for interactive elements

hover.description: The colour used for the secondary interactive elements when in a hover state

disabled.description: The colour used for disabled interactive elements

default.description: A neutral colour for interactive elements, typically for an initial state

hover.description: The colour used for neutral interactive elements when in a active/selected state

active.description: The colour used for neutral interactive elements when in an active/selected state

default.description: An inverse colour for interactive elements

hover.description: The colour used for inverse interactive elements when in a hover state

disabled.description: The colour used for inverse interactive elements when in a disabled state

primary.description: The primary colour for text elements

secondary.description: A secondary colour for text elements that require less visual emphasis

tertiary.description: A tertiary colour for text elements that require the least amount of visual emphasis

accent.description: The highlight colour for text elements. Use sparingly

inverse.description: The colour for text in inverse or high-contrast situations, ensuring readability against a contrasting background

neutral.description: Neutral border colour that matches color.surface.layer.neutral

accent.description: A border accent colour, typically used to highlight active elements

positive.description: The colour for elements associated with positive feedback

warning.description: The colour for elements associated with warnings

negative.description: The colour for elements conveying negative feedback

text.description: The text colour for elements conveying negative feedback

info.description: The colour for elements conveying informational feedback

text.description: The text colour for elements conveying informational feedback

new.description: The colour for new features and notifications

pending.description: The colour for pending statuses or information

positive.description: The background colour for elements associated with positive feedback

warning.description: The background colour for elements associated with warnings

negative.description: The background colour for elements conveying negative feedback

info.description: The background colour for elements conveying informational feedback

pending.description: The background colour for pending statuses or information

negative.description: The text color for elements conveying negative feedback

info.description: The text colour for elements conveying informational feedback

positive.description: The text color for elements conveying positive feedback

active.description: Colour for elements that communicate the state AvailabilityState.ACTIVE

passive.description: Colour for elements that communicate the state AvailabilityState.PASSIVE

inactive.description: Colour for elements that communicate the state AvailabilityState.INACTIVE

active.description: Colour for background elements that communicate the state AvailabilityState.ACTIVE

passive.description: Colour for background elements that communicate the state AvailabilityState.PASSIVE
Colour for text that communicates the state AvailabilityState.PASSIVE

ir35-inside.description: The colour for elements that communicate an Inside IR35 status

ir35-outside.description: The colour for elements that communicate an Outside IR35 status

ir35-inside.description: The colour for background elements that communicate an Inside IR35 status

ir35-outside.description: The colour for background elements that communicate an Outside IR35 status

ic.description: The colour for elements that communicate the classification result is Independent Contractor

employee.description: The colour for elements that communicate the classification result is Employee

ic.description: The colour for background elements that communicate the classification result is Independent Contractor

employee.description: The colour for background elements that communicate the classification result is Employee

primary.description: Specifies a primary colour for containers

secondary.description: Specifies a secondary colour for containers

neutral.description: Specifies a neutral colour for containers

inverse.description: Specifies an inverse colour for containers

primary.description: Primary colour for achievements and prizes

secondary.description: Secondary colour for achievements and prizes

default.description: The default border colour for elements that receive user input

active.description: The border colour for elements that receive user input when in active state

disabled.description: The border colour for elements that receive user input when in disabled state

hover.description: The border colour for elements that receive user input when in hover state

default.description: The default background colour for elements that receive user input

disabled.description: The background colour for elements that receive user input when in disabled state

hover.description: The background colour for elements that receive user input when in hover state

checked.description: The background colour for elements that receive user input when in checked state

active.description: The background colour for elements that receive user input when in active state

high.description: Colour to convey high priority information

medium.description: Colour to convey medium priority information

low.description: Colour to convey low priority information

unavailable.description: Colour to represent candidates that have responded as 'unavailable'

applied.description: Colour to represent candidates that have 'applied'

submitted.description: Colour to represent candidates that have been 'submitted' by a recruiter

primary.description: The primary surface colour for page backgrounds

accent.description: An accented surface colour, used for page backgrounds in modal views
